display_long_description:
In Movin Force, the player will embark on a journey to become a respected and beloved champion in the world of Kore.
The world of Kore was once divided and disputed by four nations in perpetual conflict. However, almost two centuries ago, the conflicts ended, and to solidify the alliance, a common capital was erected for all nations: ALBA NOVA, where the most important tournament, the Kore Tournament, takes place.
In this competition, the blending of traditions and various games has facilitated a deeper understanding of the spirit that drives each nation. Participation in the Kore tournament is not open to all; you must earn recognition from sports masters spread across the continent in order to be admitted. Each sport has its origins in different nations, therefore as an athlete, you will need to visit the greatest experts and obtain the emblem of their nation. 
Once you have passed their tests and mastered the 8 games, you can participate in the Kore Tournament, where challenge after challenge you can earn the title of champion and raise the tournament trophy.
If you want to improve your skills in a sport and achieve an online score that can make your favorite sports master proud, all you have to do is join the Arcade.
Movin Force is a unique fitness game, thanks to its campaign mode and the design of its 8 sports, capable of entertaining the player while simultaneously helping burn calories.
